title: Future Leaders in Sealing System
description: SCENIC SEALS MAKE YOUR WORK EASY.
content:
▪️雙軸封
▪️ VOC防制專用
▪️ DIN/ANSI卡匣 串列式
▪️ 耐高温高壓

title: INSPIRATION & INNOVATION
description: SCENIC SEALS NON-CONTACTING DRY GAS SEAL.
content:
▪️專為蒸氣式渦輪機設計
▪️ 可靠度高,非接觸式軸封零磨耗。

title: ECO FRIENDLY SEALING.
description: SCENIC SEALS MAKE YOUR WORK EASY.
content:
▪️ 大型攪拌機。
▪️震幅大及運轉時軸心偏擺大的轉動設備應用。
▪️ 防止VOC揮發之雙重密封轉動設備。
